cookingTips: Separate eggs and beat whites until stiff peaks form; fold gently into batter for light, fluffy texture
Mix dry ingredients first, then combine with buttermilk and egg yolks before folding in whites
Use wooden skewers to turn each aebleskiver halfway through cooking in the special pan for evenly browned spheres
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook master these Danish-inspired pancake balls using proper egg separation and folding technique. Emphasize the importance of the special pan and turning method.
